attributes.action: for current passport holders not attend these 'passport interviews' in the future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are plans for people needing to apply for passports (even renewing) has to attend to an interview for their next passport. Unless the passport holder has let their passport expire, or loses it should attend the interviews. It will cost a lot of money and inconvience for people. As they probably have to book a day's leave (knowing the govt the interviews won't happen on weekends) to travel up to 200 miles. I have been on passports since I was 9 months old (I am in my late 20s) and I don't seem why should I attend such a pointless interview.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
